name: Speed Mower
description:
Made for the Lame Jam 19 game jam

Instructions:

Just hit play when you get the main menu. Movement is done by steering with the mouse, and pushing or pulling the mower with 'W 'and 'D' respectively.

I didn't have a lot of time for this jam but I managed to get this thrown together. Hope you enjoy the scenery!

Check out my other games (A lot more fun):

https://colbydg.itch.io/redneck-fishin
